1 Kings or 3 Kings__16.23__In the one and thirtieth year: : Amri began to reign in the seven and twentieth year of Asa; but had not quiet possession of the kingdom till the death of his competitor Thebni, which was in the one and thirtieth year of Asa's reign.
1 Kings or 3 Kings__16.26__With their vanities: : That is, their idols their golden calves, vain, false, deceitful things.
